bill.disclaimer.content: Bill Management is a product provided to customers by Employment Hero Pty Ltd and its affiliates (Employment Hero) under its {brandName} brand. This product is provided by Employment Hero to facilitate its customers’ sign up process with the selected provider and to provide customers with the ability to view bills. The selected provider is an independent third party service provider and Employment Hero has no control over, or give any representation or warranties about, the selected provider’s services, business operations and websites. The selected provider will be solely responsible for any issues you have with their products, services or the content on their website. Your use of the selected provider’s services and access to their websites will be governed by their terms and conditions, including those which relate to data privacy and security. Any information provided in relation to the Bill Management product also does not take into account your objectives, financial situation or needs, and you should consider whether it is appropriate for you by carrying out your own research and seeking independent advice.
bill.disclaimer.medibankContent:
Bill Management is a product provided to customers by Employment Hero Pty Ltd and its affiliates (Employment Hero) under its {brandName} brand. This product is provided by Employment Hero to facilitate its customers’ sign up process with the selected provider and to provide customers with the ability to view bills. The selected provider is an independent third party service provider and Employment Hero has no control over, or give any representation or warranties about, the selected provider’s services, business operations and websites. The selected provider will be solely responsible for any issues you have with their products, services or the content on their website. Your use of the selected provider’s services and access to their websites will be governed by their terms and conditions, including those which relate to data privacy and security. Any information provided in relation to the Bill Management product also does not take into account your objectives, financial situation or needs, and you should consider whether it is appropriate for you by carrying out your own research and seeking independent advice.
By using this offer you agree to the sharing of your personal information between Employment Hero and Medibank for the purposes of giving access to and promoting the offer, verifying your current and continued eligibility for the benefits, providing you with the services and benefits under this offer, personalising your experience on Employment Hero, and quality assurance and product development. {ehPrivacy} and {medibankPrivacy} will apply regarding their respective data privacy practices when handling your personal. Your personal information may be disclosed overseas as described in those privacy policies.

step1.heading: Support the {brandName} community
step1.body: You're part of community of 2M users negotiating VIP deals to fight the rising cost of living. With the strength of millions behind you, unlock the best price on essentials like groceries, fuel and utilities. Shape future deals and secure exclusive offers everywhere you go.

step2.heading: Power in numbers
step2.body:
1,000 people —or 1M people —together have the power to create real change.
Join the deal groups to negotiate the best offers on everyday essentials. You can even shape their future.
Interested? Join today and start curating the deals of tomorrow.

intro.title: It's your pay, every day.
intro.body: What would you do if you could get paid every day? We’re flipping the script and giving you access to your own money, as soon as you earn it. It’s that just-got-paid feeling, now available every day.

ssa_incentive.title: Get up to 50% of your daily salary deposited into your account every day!
ssa_incentive.content: To start receiving your InstaPay Daily, simply open a Swag Spend Account.

intro.premier_partners: When you shop with these premier partners: Booking.com, Virgin Australia, The Iconic, and Pet Circle.

one_percent_tnc.extra_1_cashback: Extra 1% cashback for InstaPay Daily Promotion Terms & Conditions
one_percent_tnc.this_promotion_offered: This Promotion is offered by Employment Hero Pty Ltd (ABN 11 160 047 709)
one_percent_tnc.enjoy_an_extra_1: Enjoy an extra 1% cashback when you sign up for InstaPay Daily and shop with these premier partners: Booking.com, Virgin Australia, The Iconic, and Pet Circle.
one_percent_tnc.this_promo_start: This promotion will start on the day of your subscription and end on 30th June 24.
one_percent_tnc.the_promo_opened: The Promotion is open to a select group of EH users who are eligible for InstaPay Daily and have not subscribed.
one_percent_tnc.how_to_qualify: How to qualify for the Promotion?
one_percent_tnc.to_qualify: To qualify for the Promotion, you must:
one_percent_tnc.make_a_purchase: Make a purchase on one of the 4 selected cashback offers within the promotion period.
one_percent_tnc.the_status: The status of the cashback transaction has to change to settled/cleared.
one_percent_tnc.when_promo_apply: When do the benefits of the Promotion apply?
one_percent_tnc.any_use_that: Any user that is subscribed during this promotion period AND make a purchase on one of the 4 selected cashback offers during the promotion period will get the extra 1% cashback, once the cashback status changes to settled/cleared.
one_percent_tnc.the_extra_1: The extra 1% cashback amount will be directly debited to the user's swag spend account.
one_percent_tnc.restrections: The Promotion cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer or promotion provided by Employment Hero. Restrictions to the Promotion apply to those who are not eligible according to the criteria of qualifications listed above.
one_percent_tnc.the_promo_cannot: The Promotion cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer or promotion provided by Employment Hero. Restrictions to the Promotion apply to those who are not eligible according to the criteria of qualifications listed above.
one_percent_tnc.ohter_terms: Other Terms and Conditions that apply
one_percent_tnc.the_promo_managed: This Promotion is managed in accordance with the
one_percent_tnc.discounts_provided_thorugh: Discounts provided through the Promotion are not transferable to any other products.
one_percent_tnc.eh_reserves: Employment Hero reserves the right to terminate the Promotion early in full or in part at its absolute discretion.
one_percent_tnc.laws_may_apply: Laws may apply to you or to Employment Hero as a result of your specific location. If this is the case, and if those laws are inconsistent with any part of these terms, those laws will prevail to the extent of the inconsistency.
one_percent_tnc.serverability: Severability: If any part or provision of these terms are invalid, unenforceable or in conflict with the law, that part or provision is replaced with a provision which, as far as possible, accomplishes the original purpose of that part or provision. The remainder of these terms will be binding on the parties.
one_percent_tnc.governing_law: Governing Law: These terms are governed by the laws of New South Wales, Australia and the parties submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of its courts.
one_percent_tnc.extra_one_percent_title: Sign up with Instapay Daily and get extra 1% cashback at your favourite retailers

saver.summary: A user with a mortgage could pay off their loan up to 6 years faster.
saver.info: A user with a $500,000 loan over 30 years with an interest rate of 6.5% who has set repayments to weekly, can save up to $150,000 in interest and almost 6 years in loan term. All because they didn’t wait for payday. *Not financial advice

spender.summary: The average person could potentially save up to $337 each year on credit fees and interest.

info.fragment_2: shows the average Australian has roughly $4,331 of credit debt. Using the
info.fragment_3: credit calculator, we can see that this debt, if paid off in minimum repayments, would incur roughly $337 in interest charges per annum. *Not financial advice

instaPayEducationCarousel.title: InstaPay Now
instaPayEducationCarousel.subtitle: Access to your earnings instantly
instaPayEducationCarousel.description:
You’ve worked hard, so why wait.
Get access to the money you’ve already earned before pay day.
instaPayEducationCarousel.bulletPoint2: Withdraw directly to your Swag Spend account.
instaPayEducationCarousel.bulletPoint3: Spend, save, or invest as you please!

payCircleEducationCarousel.title:
Why is my
balance $0?
payCircleEducationCarousel.info: Because InstaPay Now depends on your pay cycle. But don’t worry, we'll notify you when it's available, allowing you to access

payCircleMonthlyContent.title: I get paid monthly
payCircleMonthlyContent.info: Most people are paid a portion of their salary in arrears and a portion in advance.
payCircleMonthlyContent.info2: In the example you are paid half arrears, half advance:
payCircleMonthlyContent.info3: InstaPay Now available in the 2 weeks in arrears.
payCircleMonthlyContent.info5: Jo’s pay cycle is 1st - 31st. Jo’s employer began processing their pay on the 14th and it was processed and paid on the 15th. InstaPay Now is available between 1st - 14th.

payCircleFortnightlyContent.title: I get paid fortnightly
payCircleFortnightlyContent.info: You are paid half in arrears, half advance:
payCircleFortnightlyContent.info2: InstaPay Now available for arrears portion.
payCircleFortnightlyContent.info4: Sam’s pay cycle is 1st - 14th. Sam’s employer began processing their pay on the 6th and it was processed and paid on the 7th. InstaPay Now is available between the 1st - 6th.

payCircleWeeklyContent.title: I get paid weekly
payCircleWeeklyContent.info: You are always paid in arrears:
payCircleWeeklyContent.info2: InstaPay Now will only be available when your organisation is not actively processing your weekly pay run.

payCircleDefinition.arrearsDefinition: Payment for time worked after completing the work.
payCircleDefinition.advanceDefinition: Payment received before completing the work.
payCircleDefinition.salaryDefinition: You can be a salaried employee without being full-time.
payCircleDefinition.payRunDefinition: Process by payroll admins to pay all employees.
payCircleDefinition.payCycleDefinition: Time period of payment (weekly, fortnightly, monthly).

spenderBts.title: How we calculate this
spenderBts.content: {brandName} {research} shows the average Australian has roughly $4,331 of credit debt. Using the {AGM} credit calculator, we can see that this debt, if paid off in minimum repayments, would incur roughly $337 in interest charges per annum. *Not financial advice

homeOwnerBts.title: How we calculate this
homeOwnerBts.content: A user with a $500,000 loan over 30 years with an interest rate of 6.5% who has set repayments to weekly, can save up to $150,000 in interest and almost 6 years in loan term. All because they didn’t wait for payday. *Not financial advice

secondPage.title: Access InstaPay Now after 2 pay runs
secondPage.content1: You can access InstaPay Now after completing two pay runs with your employer. Don't worry, we'll notify you when it's available.
secondPage.content2: InstaPay Now also depends on your pay cycle.

incomeAndTotal.title: Income and Total on Payday:
incomeAndTotal.description: Income is an estimate from your recent payslips. Total shows what you’ll receive on payday after early withdrawals, excluding leave or other deductions.

paydayEstimate.title: Payday Estimate:
paydayEstimate.description: This estimate doesn’t account for weekends or public holidays.

bottomSheet.budgetingTip: Plan your budget carefully and be mindful of the actual amount you’ll receive on payday.

footer.byConfirmingStatement: By confirming, you agree to our
footer.tncName: Perks and Earned Wage Access Now Terms and Conditions
footer.deductionStatement: . This transaction will show as a deduction on your payslip from {organisation}.

instapayAd.title: Pay a reduced fee of only 1.3% when you InstaPay Now into your Swag Spend account
instapayAd.description: All you have to do is set up a Swag Spend account and select this account when making an InstaPay Now request.

whatPayIsEligible.title: What pay is eligible?
whatPayIsEligible.content: You are eligible to access 50% of your unpaid net pay owed. There is a maximum withdrawal limit of $1000 per week.

howAreFundsDeducted.title: How are funds deducted?
howAreFundsDeducted.content1: Transactions in a given pay period will be deducted from your payslip in that pay period’s pay run.
howAreFundsDeducted.content2: You will see the transaction reflected on your payslip as a deduction, with a corresponding reference number in your history.

howAreFundsCalculated.title: How are funds calculated?
howAreFundsCalculated.content1: ‘Available funds’ shows 50% of an estimated total amount of money eligible for withdrawal. This total amount is calculated based on the amount of time you have worked - but have not yet been paid for - in the current pay period.
howAreFundsCalculated.content2: For salaried employees, ‘Available funds’ shows 50% of a proportion of your salary eligible for withdrawal. This proportion is calculated based on the total number of days you have worked in the current pay period.

whatAreTheFees.title: What are the fees?
whatAreTheFees.content: A fee is charged per transaction depending on what account you nominate your funds be deposited into - 1.3% to your Swag Spend Account or 1.5% to all other bank accounts.

whenWillIReceiveMyFunds.title: When will I receive my funds?
whenWillIReceiveMyFunds.content: You should receive your funds within 1-2 hours.

carousel.heading: Access to your earnings instantly
carousel.body: You've worked hard, so why wait. Get access to the money you've already earned before pay day.
carousel.bullet_2: Withdraw directly to your Swag Spend account.
carousel.bullet_3: Spend, save, or invest as you please!

payrunInstruction.body_1: Availability depends on your employer and your pay frequency.
payrunInstruction.body_2: If your employer is yet to process your pay, InstaPay Now will be unavailable, however you should expect to be paid soon. (Yay!)
payrunInstruction.note: Your pay period may vary depending on when your employer chooses to process pay, weekends and public holidays.

definitions.heading: Definitions:
definitions.arrear_explained: Payment for time worked after completing the work.
definitions.advance_explained: Payment received before completing the work.
definitions.salary_explained: You can be a salaried employee without being full-time.
definitions.payrun_explained: Process by payroll admins to pay all employees.
definitions.payCycle_explained: Time period of payment (weekly, fortnightly, monthly).

weekly.heading: You are paid weekly
weekly.body_1: You are always paid in arrears:
weekly.body_2: Accessing your earned pay will only be available when your organisation is not actively processing your weekly pay run.

fortnightly.heading: You are paid fortnightly
fortnightly.body_1: You are paid half in arrears, half advance:
fortnightly.body_2: Accessing your earned pay available for arrears portion.
fortnightly.caption: E.g. Sam's pay cycle is 1st - 14th. Sam's employer began processing their pay on the 6th and it was processed and paid on the 7th. Accessing your earned pay is available between the 1st - 6th.

monthly.heading: You are paid monthly
monthly.body_1: Most people are paid a portion of their salary in arrears and a portion in advance.
monthly.body_2: In the example you are paid half arrears, half advance:
monthly.body_3: Accessing your earned pay is available in the 2 weeks in arrears.
monthly.caption_2: Jo's pay cycle is 1st - 31st. Jo's employer began processing their pay on the 14th and it was processed and paid on the 15th. Accessing your earned pay is available between 1st - 14th.

scheduling-experiment.ad: Take control of the way you get paid!
scheduling-experiment.subtitle-no-option: Tell us your preferred InstaPay scheduling.

bottom-sheet.title: Your preferred InstaPay scheduling
bottom-sheet.next-pay-day-description: Thank you for your feedback, keep an eye out for your upcoming pay day.
bottom-sheet.weekly-description: Thank you for choosing weekly as your preference. We're currently diligently working on InstaPay scheduling. You will receive a reminder notification each week when $50 is available for use. If you wish to opt out, simply visit the Support tab.

submit-leave-ad.title: Access up to $1,000 of your salary per week!

availableBalance.caption: Available balance:
availableBalance.description: You'll be paid when your available balance reaches your chosen amount (available balance is up to 50% of your earned pay). If your available balance is too low, we'll try again the next day.

withDay.chooseAmount: 1. Choose a recurring amount or day (if applicable)
withDay.receiveAt9PM: 3. When your balance reaches the chosen amount or your set payment day arrives, the payment will be processed at 9 PM.

withoutDay.receiveAt9PM: 3. Once the balance accumulates to your chosen amount, you’ll receive it at 9 PM.

bankAccount.transactionFeeReminder: * Each withdrawal incurs a transaction fee.

subscribed.recurringPaymentSetTo: Your recurring payments are set to:

body.freeTrialAndCashback: FREE one month trial + Extra 1% cashback*

now.caption: Now
now.errorCaption: This could be for the following reasons:
now.underMaintenance: Apologies, accessing your earned pay is currently under maintenance, please try again later.

promotion.content: Subscribe to recurring pay and save 33% per transaction.

dateOption.title: I want to get paid on...
dateOption.recommendedDay: We recommend scheduling for {day}, as that's typically when your employer pays you.

amountOption.title: I want to be paid the amount of...

startingDateOption.title: Starting from...
startingDateOption.recommendedDay: We recommend scheduling for {day}, as that's typically when your employer pays you. Please note only weekdays are allowed.

confirmation.caption: Please confirm your ongoing withdrawal request.

amountInfo.waitUntilDailyEndReminder: Please note that you'll only start receiving this after your current daily subscription ends.

confirmation.amountAndFeeSummary: You’ll pay a {fee} fee, a total of {deductionAmount} will be deducted from your payslip.
confirmation.feeSummary: You'll pay a {fee}% fee which will be deducted from your payslip.

paySlipDeductionSummary.byConfirmingStatement: By confirming, you agree to our
paySlipDeductionSummary.tncName: Perks and Earned Wage Access Terms and Conditions
paySlipDeductionSummary.deductionStatement: for scheduled withdrawals. These transactions will show as a deduction on your payslip from {organisation}.

successScreen.title: Cha-ching! You've scheduled to receive {amount} whenever it’s ready 💸🎉
successScreen.subtitle: which could happen multiple times a month.

modification.subtitle: You've successfully cancelled your ongoing withdraw.

byDay.title: Cha-ching! You've scheduled to receive up to {amount} on {day} 💸🎉
byDay.anyBalanceTitle: Cha-ching! You've scheduled to receive your pay on {day} 💸🎉

modificationScreen.byAmountTitle: You've selected to withdraw every {amount} you earn.

optOutSurveyScreen.title: Opt out Your Earned Pay
optOutSurveyScreen.heading: We're sorry to hear you are opting out of your recurring schedule
optOutSurveyScreen.body: Your feedback is invaluable to us. Could you please share your reasons for opting out?

reason1.option1: Decided to wait until my full paycheck
reason1.option3: Felt more comfortable with usual payday
reason1.option5: Would prefer to pick the day instead

reason2.description: I wasn't sure how it worked because...
reason2.option1: Unclear on how much can be accessed
reason2.option2: Unclear on the impact it has to payday
reason2.option4: Unclear on how quickly funds are available

reason3.description: I prefer waiting for payday because...
reason3.option4: No need to access pay early
reason3.option5: Don't understand how this helps me budget

reason4.description: I prefer a different schedule because...
reason4.option1: Prefer to be paid weekly on the same day
reason4.option2: Prefer to be paid fortnightly on the same day
reason4.option3: Want to align pay schedule with specific bills or expenses

reason5.description: I am confused about recurring scheduling because...
reason5.option1: Unclear on when my balance will reach my set amount
reason5.option2: Prefer to choose a specific regular day instead
reason5.option3: Misunderstood how it aligns with pay dates

reason6.description: It was not what I expected because...
reason6.option1: Different feature to what I expected
reason6.option2: Expected a different level of flexibility

reason7.option1: Alternative options had lower fees or costs
reason7.option2: Other services aligned better with specific bills or expenses
reason7.option3: Prefer features offered by other services
reason7.option4: Found options with more flexibility in schedule timing

successScreen.caption: Want to automate that?

InstaPayNowReceivingAccount.accessUpToStatement: You can access up to {maximumAmount} of your salary each week, with no minimum limit.

multipleOrgs.chooseEmployerCaption: Choose an employer to get paid from

errors.noOrgsHaveAvailableBalance: Apologies, none of the organisations have available balances right now. Please try again later.

confirmation.promotionStatement: Your {promotionPercentage}% fee promotion will expire if you cancel. Are you sure you want to stop receiving recurring payments?
confirmation.statement: Are you sure you want to continue cancelling recurring withdrawal?

daily.heading: Cancel daily subscription
daily.confirmation: Are you sure you want to continue cancelling daily withdrawal?

error.title: Sorry, we failed to verify your account details
error.description: Please use another account or try again later.

recurringSuccessCTA.title: Turn on push notifications
recurringSuccessCTA.description: Push notifications will be sent to you regarding your recurring schedule.

successfulPayment.caption: More information
successfulPayment.content: Successful payment notifications will trigger whenever a scheduled transaction is successful.

insufficientBalance.caption: More information
insufficientBalance.content: Insufficient balance notifications will trigger when it is your payment day and you have not quite reached your set amount.

error.toastCaption: Sorry, we could not process your request. Try again later.

mobile-verification.title: Mobile Verification
mobile-verification.heading: Please confirm your mobile phone number.
mobile-verification.description: For your security, we need to confirm your mobile phone number and verify it with a One Time Password (OTP) before verifying your identity. This will ensure that only you can access any ID documents you upload.

ageNotQualifiedScreen.title: We're sorry, you don't qualify for a Swag Spend account.
ageNotQualifiedScreen.description: Your application can't be processed as you need to be over the age of {age} to set up a Swag Spend account.

dailyLimit.title: Oops! Looks like you have reached your Swag Spend Account daily transfer limit
dailyLimit.description: Please contact support for further assistance.

dailyLimit.title: Please note there is a transfer out limit of $5000 within a 24-hour period.

accountNameWarning.title: Account names aren't used for payments, so check that the BSB and account number are correct. If the money is paid to the wrong account, you may not get it back.

payeeAddress.header: Who are you sending money to?
payeeAddress.removeDescription: This action cannot be undone. The payee {payeeNickname} will be removed from your list of saved payees.

re-enroll.title: Please confirm your fingerprint / Face ID.
re-enroll.description: For your security, we need to confirm your fingerprint/Face ID before verifying your identity
re-enroll.error: Sorry, we could not process your request. Try again later.

errors.missing_street_name: Oops, it looks like the street name is missing from your address.
errors.missing_suburb: Oops, it looks like the Suburb is missing from your address.
errors.missing_state: Oops, it looks like the State is missing from your address.

points.reimburseExplain3: Within a few days, get reimbursed $10 in your Spend account, taken from your Hero Points balance (approx. 220 points).
